## Type of Change
- [ ] Content addition (new page or section)
- [ ] Content correction (fixing existing information)
- [ ] Part number update
- [ ] Component/feature update
- [ ] Bug fix (site functionality)
- [ ] Other (describe below)

## Content Checklist
- [ ] Information is technically accurate and verified
- [ ] Sources are cited where applicable
- [ ] Part numbers are validated against BMW ETK / realoem.com
- [ ] Torque specs reference BMW TIS data
- [ ] Frontmatter is complete (title, description, difficulty, applicable models)
- [ ] Custom components used where appropriate (PartNumber, TorqueSpec, etc.)
- [ ] Safety warnings included for critical procedures
- [ ] Spelling and grammar checked

## Applicable Models
- [ ] 330i (sedan)
- [ ] 330Ci (coupe/convertible)
- [ ] 330xi (all-wheel drive)
- [ ] All of the above
